mapper.select: select * from(SELECT seq,title,writer,writedate,image,RANK()OVER (ORDER BY seq DESC) RANK FROM info_Board order by writedate desc)where Rank between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update info_Board set title=#{title},writedate=sysdate,contents=#{contents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image=#{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seq=#{seq}
